originalTitle: Rare prison sentences handed to Cameroon soldiers after killing of 21 civilians
title: Rare prison sentences handed to Cameroon soldiers after killing of 21 civilians
content: In a rare occurence, three soldiers were handed jail terms for killings in the troubled Anglophone region.

originalTitle: South African farmers fear devastation as foot-and-mouth takes hold
title: South African farmers fear devastation as foot-and-mouth takes hold
content: The government has begun a vaccination programme but officials have been blamed for a slow response.

originalTitle: Tunisian MP jailed for eight months over posts mocking president
title: Tunisian MP jailed for eight months over posts mocking president
content: The MP was arrested this month after mocking the president's handling of the recent floods in the country.

originalTitle: Senegal football federation denounces verdict in Morocco against fans
title: Senegal football federation denounces verdict in Morocco against fans
content: Eighteen Senegal fans were detained following the AFCON final in Morocco on January 18 and were sentenced on Thursday.

originalTitle: Iran says US military build-up ‘unnecessary and unhelpful’, deal achievable
title: Iran says US military build-up ‘unnecessary and unhelpful’, deal achievable
content: Top Iranian diplomat Abbas Araghchi says US 'has not asked' for zero uranium enrichment in nuclear talks.

originalTitle: A fragile freedom for Venezuela’s released political prisoners
title: A fragile freedom for Venezuela’s released political prisoners
content: Venezuela's new government has released hundreds of political detainees. But does that mean freedom?

originalTitle: Tariffs ruling is major blow to Trump's second-term agenda
title: Tariffs ruling is major blow to Trump's second-term agenda
content: The Supreme Court has weakened Trump's hand in dealing with other nations, writes Anthony Zurcher.

originalTitle: Nasa targets early March to send humans back around the Moon
title: Nasa targets early March to send humans back around the Moon
content: Nasa sets the launch date following a successful "wet dress rehearsal" of the Artemis II mission.

originalTitle: Austrian climber found guilty after girlfriend froze to death on mountain
title: Austrian climber found guilty after girlfriend froze to death on mountain
content: The woman died of hypothermia during a climbing trip on the Grossglockner mountain in January 2025.

originalTitle: Ratcliffe avoids FA charge over immigration comments
title: Ratcliffe avoids FA charge over immigration comments
content: Manchester United co-owner Sir Jim Ratcliffe's claims the UK has been "colonised by immigrants" will not lead to any sanction by the Football Association.

title: Mourinho made 'unacceptable, huge mistake' - Kompany
content: Bayern Munich boss Vincent Kompany says Jose Mourinho made a "huge mistake" with his "unacceptable" post-match comments after the alleged racial abuse of Real Madrid winger Vinicius Jr.

originalTitle: Glasner's Crystal Palace future in serious doubt
title: Glasner's Crystal Palace future in serious doubt
content: Sources tell BBC Sport that Crystal Palace's board is considering Oliver Glasner's future at the club.
